name: A Stroll in the Shire
description:
A Stroll in the Shire is a microgame implementing a classic action adventure boss fight.

Fight waves of minor enemies and kill the wizard with his own weapons (hinthint)

Controls:

Gamepad (recommended): X attack, A block, left stick or d-pad to move (XBox controller layout)

Keyboard: CTRL attack, ALT block, WASD or cursor keys to move
